mapper.select:
select bf.Id, bf.MemberId, bf.ProjectId, bf.CreateTime, bf.IsDel, p.ProjectName, p.projectStatus from projectfavorite bf left join project p on bf.ProjectId=p.Id where bf.memberid = #{memberid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and p.projectStatus=#{projectStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.insert: insert into projectfavorite (Id, MemberId, ProjectId, CreateTime, IsDel) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{projectid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into projectfavorite
Id,
MemberId,
ProjectId,
CreateTime,
IsDel,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{memberid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{projectid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update projectfavorite
MemberId = #{memberid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ProjectId = #{projectid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IsDel = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
